content.question: What is the value of <math alttext="the limit as h approaches 0, of, the fraction with numerator, open parenthesis, 16 plus h, close parenthesis, raised to the one fourth power, minus 2, and denominator h" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><munder><mrow><mi>lim</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>h</mi><mo>→</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow></munder><mfrac><mrow><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>16</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>h</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mrow><mi>h</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math> ?

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
